channel.title: Whats the best free file host or web host with the fastest download rates?
channel.description:
I just need somewhere to host my maps and stuff for call of duty United offense and i need a place that has a higher download rate then 50kb a sec max
Does anyone have any suggestions.
Also the file host must be able to have a folder called UO as some hosts have a minimum letter protection what ever it lol :P
Help would be much appreciated

item.title: Whats the best free file host or web host with the fastest download rates?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

yea. send me details in PM please

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the best free file host or web host with the fastest download rates?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

TheBeanie:

there are a few files, and they might become more. but shouldnt be more then 30 at around 10mb average (most will be about 4mb max but things like the main mod will be about 20mb and maps are 4mb for big ones.

Ok, do you know how to use ftp?
